verses.verse: So <S%G5119><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> flogged him. <S%G3146><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> soldiers <S%G4757><s%> twisted <S%G4120><s%> thorns <S%G173><s%> into <S%G1537><s%> a crown, <S%G4735><s%> and put <S%G2007><s%> it on <S%G2007><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head, <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dressed <S%G4016><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in a purple <S%G4210><s%> garment. <S%G2440><s%>
They <S%G2532><s%> kept saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Hail, <S%G5463><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews! <S%G2453><s%>" and <S%G2532><s%> they kept <S%G4475><s%> slapping <S%G1325><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out <S%G1854><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Behold, <S%G1492><s%> I bring <S%G71><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out <S%G1854><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you may know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I find <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> basis for a charge <S%G156><s%> against <S%G1722><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out, <S%G1854><s%> wearing <S%G5409><s%> the crown <S%G4735><s%> of thorns <S%G174><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the purple <S%G4210><s%> garment. <S%G2440><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Pilate said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Behold, <S%G1492><s%> the man! <S%G444><s%>"

When <S%G3753><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the officers <S%G5257><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> they shouted, <S%G3004><s%> saying, "Crucify! <S%G4717><s%> Crucify! <S%G4717><s%>" Pilate <S%G4091><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Take <S%G2983><s%> him <S%G846><s%> yourselves, <S%G2532><s%> and crucify <S%G4717><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> find <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> basis for <S%G1063><s%> a charge <S%G156><s%> against <S%G1722><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>"

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "We <S%G2249><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> a law, <S%G3551><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> he ought <S%G3784><s%> to die, <S%G599><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he made <S%G4160><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"
When <S%G3753><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> saying, <S%G3056><s%> he was <S%G5399><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> afraid. <S%G5399><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the Praetorium <S%G4232><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> "Where <S%G4159><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> from? <S%G1161><s%>" But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> answer. <S%G612><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Aren't <S%G3756><s%> you <S%G2980><s%> speaking to me? <S%G1698><s%> Don't <S%G3756><s%> you <S%G1492><s%> know that <S%G3754><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to release <S%G630><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to crucify <S%G4717><s%> you? <S%G4571><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G3756><s%> "You would have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> at all against <S%G2596><s%> me, <S%G1700><s%> unless <S%G1487><s%> it <S%G3361><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> to you <S%G4671><s%> from above. <S%G509><s%> Therefore <S%G1223><s%> he who <S%G5124><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> to you <S%G4671><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> greater <S%G3173><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>"

At <S%G1537><s%> this, <S%G5127><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> was seeking to <S%G2212><s%> release <S%G630><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> cried out, <S%G2896><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> you release <S%G630><s%> this man, <S%G5126><s%> you aren't <S%G1488><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Caesar <S%G2541><s%>'s friend! <S%G5384><s%> Everyone who <S%G3956><s%> makes <S%G4160><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> a king <S%G935><s%> speaks against <S%G483><s%> Caesar! <S%G2541><s%>"

When Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5126><s%> words, <S%G3056><s%> he brought <S%G71><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> out, <S%G1854><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sat down <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the judgment seat <S%G968><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> "The Pavement, <S%G3038><s%>" but <S%G1161><s%> in Hebrew, <S%G1447><s%> "Gabbatha. <S%G1042><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> the Preparation <S%G3904><s%> Day of the Passover, <S%G3957><s%> at <S%G1161><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> "Behold, <S%G1492><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> King! <S%G935><s%>"

They <S%G1161><s%> cried out, <S%G2905><s%> "Away with <S%G142><s%> him! <S%G846><s%> Away with <S%G142><s%> him! <S%G4717><s%> Crucify him! <S%G4091><s%>" Pilate said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Shall I crucify <S%G4717><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> King? <S%G935><s%>" The chief priests <S%G749><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "We have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> king <S%G935><s%> <S%G3361><s%> but <S%G1487><s%> Caesar! <S%G2541><s%>"

So <S%G3767><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> he <S%G3860><s%> delivered him <S%G846><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> be crucified. <S%G4717><s%> So <S%G1161><s%> they took <S%G3880><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> led <S%G520><s%> him away. <S%G520><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> went out, <S%G1831><s%> bearing <S%G941><s%> his <S%G846><s%> cross, <S%G4716><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> "The Place of a Skull, <S%G2898><s%>" which <S%G3739><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> in Hebrew, <S%G1447><s%> "Golgotha, <S%G1115><s%>"

where <S%G3699><s%> they crucified <S%G4717><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> others, <S%G243><s%> on either <S%G1782><s%> side one, <S%G1782><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> in the middle. <S%G3319><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> wrote <S%G1125><s%> a title <S%G5102><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> put <S%G5087><s%> it on <S%G1909><s%> the cross. <S%G4716><s%> There <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> written, <S%G1125><s%> "JESUS <S%G2424><s%> OF NAZARETH, <S%G3480><s%> THE KING <S%G935><s%> OF THE JEWS. <S%G2453><s%>"

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> read <S%G314><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> title, <S%G5102><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> crucified was <S%G4717><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> the city; <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> in Hebrew, <S%G1447><s%> in Latin, <S%G4515><s%> and in Greek. <S%G1676><s%>

The chief priests <S%G749><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Pilate, <S%G4091><s%> "Don't <S%G3361><s%> write, <S%G1125><s%> <S%G935><s%> 'The King of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%>' but, <S%G235><s%> <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1565><s%> 'he said, <S%G2036><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews. <S%G2453><s%>'"
Pilate <S%G4091><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "What <S%G3739><s%> I have written, <S%G1125><s%> I have written. <S%G1125><s%>"

Then <S%G3767><s%> the soldiers, <S%G4757><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they had crucified <S%G4717><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> his <S%G846><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> parts, <S%G3313><s%> to every <S%G1538><s%> soldier <S%G4757><s%> a part; <S%G3313><s%> and also <S%G2532><s%> the coat. <S%G5509><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> the coat <S%G5509><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> without seam, <S%G729><s%> woven <S%G5307><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the top <S%G509><s%> <S%G1223><s%> throughout. <S%G3650><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> one another, <S%G240><s%> "Let <S%G4977><s%>'s not <S%G3361><s%> tear <S%G4977><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G235><s%> cast lots <S%G2975><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> it <S%G846><s%> to decide whose <S%G5101><s%> it will be, <S%G2071><s%>" that <S%G2443><s%> the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> which says, <S%G3004><s%> "They parted <S%G1266><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%> among them. <S%G1438><s%> <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> cloak <S%G2441><s%> they cast <S%G906><s%> lots. <S%G2819><s%>" Therefore <S%G3767><s%> the <S%G3303><s%> soldiers <S%G4757><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> these things. <S%G5023><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> there were standing <S%G2476><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the cross <S%G4716><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>'s sister, <S%G79><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> the wife of Clopas, <S%G2832><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene. <S%G3094><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> his mother, <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the disciple <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he loved <S%G25><s%> standing there, <S%G3936><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> "Woman, <S%G1135><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> son! <S%G5207><s%>"

Then <S%G1534><s%> he <S%G3004><s%> said to the disciple, <S%G3101><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> mother! <S%G3384><s%>" <S%G2532><s%> From <S%G575><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> hour, <S%G5610><s%> the disciple <S%G3101><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> her <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his own home. <S%G2398><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> were now <S%G2235><s%> finished, <S%G5055><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G5048><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "I am thirsty. <S%G1372><s%>"

Now <S%G3767><s%> a vessel <S%G4632><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of vinegar <S%G3690><s%> was set <S%G2749><s%> there; <S%G1161><s%> so they put <S%G4060><s%> a sponge <S%G4699><s%> full <S%G4130><s%> of the vinegar <S%G3690><s%> on hyssop, <S%G5301><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> held <S%G4374><s%> it at his <S%G846><s%> mouth. <S%G4750><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> had received <S%G2983><s%> the vinegar, <S%G3690><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> "It is finished. <S%G5055><s%>" He bowed <S%G2827><s%> his head, <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gave up <S%G3860><s%> his spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> because <S%G1893><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> the Preparation <S%G3904><s%> Day, <S%G2443><s%> so that the bodies <S%G4983><s%> wouldn't <S%G3306><s%> <S%G3361><s%> remain <S%G3306><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the cross <S%G4716><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> (for <S%G1063><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a special <S%G3173><s%> one <S%G2250><s%>), asked <S%G2065><s%> of Pilate <S%G4091><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> their <S%G846><s%> legs <S%G4628><s%> might be broken, <S%G2608><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that they might be taken away. <S%G142><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> the soldiers <S%G4757><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> broke <S%G2608><s%> the legs <S%G4628><s%> <S%G99999><s%> of the first, <S%G4413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the other <S%G243><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> was crucified <S%G4957><s%> with him; <S%G846><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and saw that <S%G1492><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was already <S%G2235><s%> dead, <S%G2348><s%> they didn't <S%G3756><s%> break <S%G2608><s%> his <S%G846><s%> legs. <S%G4628><s%>

However <S%G235><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the soldiers <S%G4757><s%> pierced <S%G3572><s%> his <S%G846><s%> side <S%G4125><s%> with a spear, <S%G3057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2117><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> came out. <S%G1831><s%>

He <S%G3588><s%> who has seen <S%G3708><s%> has testified, <S%G3140><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true. <S%G228><s%> He <S%G2548><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G2548><s%> tells <S%G3004><s%> the truth, <S%G227><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> may believe. <S%G4100><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> happened, <S%G1096><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> "A bone <S%G3747><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> will <S%G4937><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be broken. <S%G4937><s%>"
<S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> Scripture <S%G1124><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "They will look <S%G3700><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him whom <S%G3739><s%> they pierced. <S%G1574><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> these things, <S%G5023><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Arimathaea, <S%G707><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> a disciple <S%G3101><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> secretly <S%G2928><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> of Pilate <S%G4091><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he might take away <S%G142><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>' body. <S%G4983><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> gave <S%G2010><s%> him permission. <S%G2010><s%> He came <S%G2064><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G142><s%> away his <S%G2424><s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Nicodemus, <S%G3530><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> at first <S%G4413><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> by night, <S%G3571><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> bringing <S%G5342><s%> a mixture <S%G3395><s%> of myrrh <S%G4666><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> aloes, <S%G250><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> a hundred <S%G1540><s%> Roman pounds. <S%G3046><s%>
